# 'clafouti-begin' recipe
# Simple activity recognition data file

# Spoon
104 SPOON_STIR.csv SPOON_STIR stir
104 SPOON_SCOOP.csv SPOON_SCOOP scoop
104 SPOON_SCOOP1.csv SPOON_SCOOP scoop

# Ladle
106 LADLE_POUR.csv LADLE_POUR scoop/pour
106 LADLE_POUR1.csv LADLE_POUR scoop

# Small knife - scrape out vanilla seeds
108 BIGKNIFE_SCRAPEOFF.csv SMALLKNIFE_SCRAPE scrape-off  # DATA FROM BIG KNIFE FOR NOW
108 SMALLKNIFE_SPREAD.csv SMALLKNIFE_SCRAPE spread
# Small knife - core pears
108 SMALLKNIFE_CORE.csv SMALLKNIFE_CORE core
# Small knife - quarter or slice pears
108 SMALLKNIFE_SLICE.csv SMALLKNIFE_SLICE slice
108 SMALLKNIFE_CHOP.csv SMALLKNIFE_SLICE chop

# Big knife - scrape out vanilla seeds
109 BIGKNIFE_SCRAPEOFF.csv BIGKNIFE_SCRAPE scrape-off
109 BIGKNIFE_SHAVE.csv BIGKNIFE_SCRAPE shave
# Big knife - quarter or slice pears
109 BIGKNIFE_CHOP.csv BIGKNIFE_SLICE chop
109 BIGKNIFE_SLICE.csv BIGKNIFE_SLICE slice

# Peeler
110 PEELER_PEEL.csv PEELER_PEEL peel

# Whisk
103 WHISK_WHISK.csv WHISK_WHISK whisk
103 WHISK_WHISK1.csv WHISK_WHISK whisk
